mapper.select: SELECT no, subject, regdate, hit, num FROM (SELECT no, subject, regdate, hit, rownum as num FROM (SELECT no, subject, regdate, hit FROM notice ORDER BY no DESC)) WHERE num BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}
mapper.insert:
